title: Bloomberg Markets: Clarke, Catalano on Impact of Cyberwar
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Clarke, Catalano on Impact of Cyberwar
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Vincent Catalano President/Global Macro Strategist Blue Marble Research Discussing the impact of a cyberwar on global investing with Richard A Clarke Former U.S. National Coordinator for Security and Counter-Terrorism.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
